name: Dash Blitz
description: Dash Blitz is a lightning-fast platform fighter with streamlined mechanics and controls. Enjoy the freedom! Blitz through the competition!
minimum_requirements: Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD6850 Storage: 5 GB available space
